original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Badulla District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 58% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 275,180 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 102,958 votes (21.92%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 5 seats in the district while the SJB have won one seat in the district.
